attributes.action: Make it illigal for landlords to refuse pets in rented property!
attributes.additional_details: If the government pass some sort of law or motion to allow this,  I strongly feel more private rented homes will be occupied quicker and for longer. It benefits everyone.
attributes.background:
People searching for a home are having a really hard time finding the perfect place due to 'No Pets Allowed'. The majority of family households have a pet. 
If you pay a deposit or a damage deposit then surely that's to cover any damage a pet may or may not cause? PETS ARE FAMILY!

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
